chunks.en: Painful experience, you must meet in person before chatting on a blind date, otherwise it's useless no matter how well you chat.

During the Spring Festival, my family introduced me to a girl. Her hometown is in a county and she works in a city. I was busy during the Spring Festival and didn't have time to meet her, so we added each other on WeChat and agreed to meet when I went to the city where she works.

Then we introduced our conditions to each other on WeChat and felt they were quite suitable. Then we chatted casually and found that our values and daily hobbies were very consistent. Then the girl was very proactive and the chat gradually heated up to the point where we were discussing when to get engaged and when to get married if we were together. I felt like I had met my soulmate. Then, finally, we were both free on the weekend, so I went to meet her. As a result, I was directly passed over as soon as we met. She said there was a difference between me and my WeChat profile picture (my profile picture was taken when I just graduated, when I was thinner and more energetic). Now she says we'll just be friends first. Sigh, I've been feeling down all day~
Before going live in the production environment, please pay attention to: thorough testing, monitoring preparation, communication and coordination, version control, and data backup.
Abstract brother, forgive my immoral laughter~
@duanxianze If you don't post it, I'll assume your profile picture is a selfie~
It's okay, the girl might come back to lick the offer because of the sluggish market. Relax and look at more resumes.

It's rare for guys to use pictures of themselves as profile pictures, maybe you thought you were pretty handsome. Luckily, I have a stupid anime profile picture and there's no such misunderstanding ğŸ¶

To directly reject someone based on appearance, to judge someone solely on appearance, ignoring hobbies, thoughts, values, character, and spiritual compatibility, can only mean that her values and cognitive depth are very limited.
At the beginning of a relationship, only cuteness is needed, but to last, ability is needed.
Any beauty or figure will become aesthetically tiring after a long time.
Human's fickle nature determines that this kind of 'like' will not last long.
Appearance is the most worthless thing in a close relationship, and its depreciation rate is also the fastest.

And when problems arise in intimate relationships, they cannot be solved by external attributes such as beauty, otherwise there would be no handsome men and beautiful women facing emotional crises or even divorce in the world.
OP doesn't need to feel hurt or even troubled by her rejection, or to doubt their self-worth.
From a medical point of view, BMI, waist-to-height ratio, and other body data within a healthy range are a good state and are worthy of praise and pride.
You are not her preferred taste, that's all, it doesn't mean you have a problem.

Someone who doesn't like spicy food will refuse Sichuan cuisine, but that doesn't mean there's anything wrong with Sichuan cuisine, and the exquisiteness and value of Sichuan cuisine itself will not be affected.
She doesn't know how to appreciate you, and her subjective evaluation alone cannot define all of you.
Appearance preference is a very subjective and diverse thing, and the standard of beauty has never been singular.
@gpt5 Don't post it, it's embarrassing.

Although it is definitely necessary to meet early, that part where "then we introduced our conditions to each other on WeChat, and we both felt it was quite suitable, then we chatted casually, and found that our values and daily hobbies were very consistent, and then the girl was very active, and the chat gradually heated up, and we even discussed how long to get engaged and how long to get married if we were together, and I had a feeling that I had met my destiny," doesn't mean the girl is really satisfied with you. Here, the girl is actually creating an atmosphere for you because her level is higher than yours, and you're still in the high-EQ girl's assessment period on WeChat.

@shadowyue Actually, it's the opposite. I don't think I'm handsome. The avatar is to save each other's time. Most girls don't reply to my messages when they see my avatar. She was very proactive, and I thought she could accept it.
It's really a sin, but it's normal. Women, like men, are mostly visual animals.
I guess everyone here likes good-looking girls and doesn't like ugly ones, but I'm different, I like ugly ones.
This situation can't inspire you to lose weight, you must really love sugar and oil mixtures!
Obesity means you have poor self-control and poor cognitive ability (in terms of health).
If you extrapolate to 10-20 years later, she may have to take care of you in bed, and it is very likely to be for the rest of her life. Of course, she is not happy about that.

chunks.en: Recommendation: Start health management, regain your vitality. First, read a few books to understand the framework of physical health, and then stop the top 3 of your wrong lifestyle behaviors. ã€ŠEat Your Way to a Healthy Bodyã€‹, Fan Zhihong's ã€ŠYou Are What You Eat (How to Eat for Chronic Diseases)ã€‹, Xia Meng's ã€ŠYou Are What You Eat (Eat Right to Get Less Sick)ã€‹, Xia Meng's
Post a picture, let the brothers see if you're really ugly.
If she can accept you when you're thin, it proves that the difference in appearance is not that big.
Don't rush.
Take your time, there are still plenty of opportunities.
Before the release, you should still do a grayscale test version, and the test data should not be hardcoded.
Change your WeChat profile picture to this
Looking at the title, I thought you passed on the girl. I feel that it's relatively rare for girls on blind dates to be obsessed with looks. More often, they look at how fat the guy's wallet is.
Are you starting to miss your younger, handsome self?

Although the poster may be able to salvage it by losing weight, I suggest being more cautious. Even if you lose weight, the other party may suddenly find something different from what they imagined and it won't work. Don't be too enthusiastic about blind dates. Saying it's destiny before meeting means you've been single for too long.
@liu731 You chatted for so long without meeting or even video chatting.
It's not like the days of carrier pigeons, it's really absurd.
After passing the interview, there's still a written test!
